com.pfc.android.archcomponent.viewmodel

Class UnifiedModelView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • android.arch.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
        • com.pfc.android.archcomponent.viewmodel.UnifiedModelView

  • public class UnifiedModelView
extends android.arch.lifecycle.AndroidViewModel
    UnifiedModelView extends AndroidViewModel

    This is the ViewModel that manage the communication between the fragments and the repository through the LiveData.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ana San Juan

      • convert

        public java.util.List<ArrivalsFormatedEntity> convert(java.util.List<ArrivalsEntity> arrivals,
                                                      java.lang.String latitude,
                                                      java.lang.String longitude)
        This Method convert one List to a List, in order to show in the list the different arrivals times (this is how is returned in the API) for a one single line in the same entry (how we want to show in the application).

        There are two parameters adding in order to add the information about the location of the stop in the favourites because after we want to show it in the application.

        Parameters:
        arrivals - List
        latitude - String
        longitude - String
        Returns:
        List
